statements: SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_accounts WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT username, qr_code_data FROM user_accounts ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM user_accounts;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_accounts WHERE username IN ('alice', 'bob', 'charlie');
SELECT MAX(user_id) AS max_id, COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM user_accounts;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, payment_amount FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, payment_amount FROM payments ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'John' AND email = 'john@example.com';
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT payment_id, amount, timestamp FROM payments WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, qr_code, status FROM transactions WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT payment_id, amount, timestamp FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, qr_code, status FROM transactions WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT users.username, payments.amount, transactions.qr_code FROM users JOIN payments ON users.user_id = payments.user_id JOIN transactions ON payments.payment_id = transactions.payment_id;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, email, username FROM user_accounts ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT qr_code_id, user_id, qr_code_data FROM qr_codes WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT log_id, transaction_id, log_message FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE username = 'JohnDoe';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_accounts ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM payment_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_date, p.username, q.qr_code_data FROM payment_transactions t JOIN user_accounts p ON t.user_id = p.user_id JOIN qr_codes q ON t.user_id = q.user_id;
SELECT t.transaction_id, l.log_message, l.log_timestamp FROM payment_transactions t JOIN transaction_logs l ON t.transaction_id = l.transaction_id WHERE l.log_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT users.username, payments.amount FROM users JOIN payments ON users.user_id = payments.user_id;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 10 AND user_id < 20;
SELECT username, login_time FROM users JOIN sessions ON users.user_id = sessions.user_id WHERE users.username LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM qr_codes WHERE qr_code_data LIKE '%ABC%' ORDER BY qr_code_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, COUNT(payment_id) AS num_payments FROM users JOIN payments ON users.user_id = payments.user_id GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY num_payments DESC;
